Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 19th overall pick, by Colorado in 2018...
Traded from Colorado to St. Louis (B) on 3/2/2018 (Going to SLB: C David Rivera. Going to COL: 3B James Wittman)...
Injured on 5/12/2018 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2019, off Jason Saterfiel (CHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/5/2019, off Buck Gleason (SEA)...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 9/30/2019...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/30/2020 with a Fractured Skull, out for 8 weeks...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2021...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,257,143 through salary arbitration...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 8/22/2022...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2022, hitting .398 with 4 HR, 27 RBI...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2022...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,257,143 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 7/16/2023 with a Bruised Jaw, out for one week...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,178,571 through salary arbitration...
